Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Purushanaagilum Sthreeyaagilum Karththarukkendru Viradham Pannikkondavargalaayirukkumpadi Nasareya Viradhamaagiya Oru Viseshiththa Poruththanaiyaip Panninaal,

3 appadippattavan Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Madhupaanaththaiyum Vilakkakkadavan; Avan Dhraatcharasaththin Kaatiyaiyum Matra Madhupaanaththin Kaatiyaiyum, Dhraatcharasaththinaal Seydha Evvidhamaana Paanaththaiyum Kudiyaamalum, Dhraatchappazhangalaiyaavadhu Dhraatcha Vatralgalaiyaavadhu Pusiyaamalum,
4 thaan Nasareyanaayirukkum Naalellaam Dhraatchachedi Vidhaimudhal Tholvaraiyilullavaigalinaal Seyyappatta Yaadhondraiyum Pusiyaamalum Irukkakkadavan.

5 avan Nasareya Viradhankaakkum Naalellaam Savaragan Kaththi Avan Thalaiyinmel Padalaagaadhu; Avan Karththarukkendru Viradhankaakkum Kaalam Niraiverumalavum Parisuththamaayirundhu, Than Thalaimayirai Valaravidakkadavan.
6 avan Karththarukkendru Viradhankaakkum Naalellaam Yaadhoru Predhaththandaiyil Pogak Koodaadhu.

7 avan Than Dhevanukkendru Seydha Nasareya Viradham Avan Thalaimel Irukkirapadiyaal, Maranamadaindha Than Thagappanaalaagilum Thaayinaalaagilum Sagodharanaalaagilum Sagodhariyinaalaagilum Thannaith Theettuppaduththalaagaadhu.
8 avan Nasareyanaayirukkum Naalellaam Karththarukkup Parisuththamaayiruppaan.

9 avanandaiyile Oruvan Sadudhiyil Maranamadaindhadhinaal, Nasareyaviradhamulla Avanudaiya Thalai Theettuppattadheyaagil, Avan Than Suththigarippin Naalaagiya Ezhaam Naalil Than Thalaimayirai Siraiththukkondu,
10 ettaam Naalil Irandu Kaattuppuraakkalaiyaavadhu Irandu Puraakkunjugalaiyaavadhu Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvarakkadavan.

11 appozhudhu Aasaariyan Ondraip Paavanivaranapaliyaagavum, Matrondrai Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagavum Seluththi, Pinaththinaal Avanukku Undaana Theettai Nivirththiseydhu, Avan Thalaiyai Annaalil Parisuththappaduththuvaanaaga.

12 avan Thirumbavum Than Viradhanaatkalaik Karththarukkendru Kaaththu, Oru Varushaththu Aattukkuttiyaik Kutranivaaranapaliyaagak Konduvarakkadavan; Avanudaiya Nasareya Viradham Theettuppattadhinaal Sendra Naatkal Virudhaavaagum.
13 nasareyanukkuriya Pramaanamaavadhu: Avan Viradhankaakkum Naatkal Niraiverina Andre, Avan Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile Vandhu,

14 sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaaga Oru Varushaththu Pazhudhatra Oru Aattukkuttiyaiyum Paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Varushaththu Pazhudhatra Oru Pennaattukkuttiyaiyum, Samaadhaanapaliyaaga Pazhudhatra Oru Aattukkadaavaiyum,

15 oru Koodaiyil Enneyile Pisaindha Pulippillaadha Melliya Maavinaal Seydha Adhirasangalaiyum, Enney Thadavappatta Pulippillaadha Adaigalaiyum, Avaigalukku Aduththa Pojanapaliyaiyum, Paanapaligalaiyum Karththarukkuth Than Kaanikkaiyaaga Seluththakkadavan.
16 avaigalai Aasaariyan Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvandhu, Avanudaiya Paavanivaarana Paliyaiyum Avanudaiya Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Seluththi,
17 aattukkadaavaik Koodaiyilirukkum Pulippillaadha Appangalodunkoodak Karththarukku Samaadhaanapaliyaaga Seluththi, Avanudaiya Pojanapaliyaiyum Paanapaliyaiyum Padaippaanaaga.

18 appozhudhu Nasareyan Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalile, Poruththanai Seyyappatta Than Thalaiyai Siraiththu, Poruththanai Seyyappatta Than Thalaimayirai Eduththu, Samaadhaanapaliyinkeezh Erigira Akkiniyil Podakkadavan.

19 nasareyan Poruththanai Seyyappatta Than Thalaimayirai Siraiththukkondapinbu, Aasaariyan Aattukkadaavinudaiya Vevikkappatta Oru Munnandhotaiyaiyum, Koodaiyil Irukkiravaigalile Pulippillaadha Oru Adhirasaththaiyum Pulippillaadha Oru Adaiyaiyum Eduththu, Avanudaiya Ullankaigalil Vaiththu,

20 avaigalaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaattakkadavan; Adhu Asaivaattappatta Maarkkandaththodum, Ereduththup Padaikkappatta Munnandhotaiyodum, Aasaariyanai Serum; Adhu Parisuththamaanadhu. Pinbu Nasareyan Dhraatcharasam Kudikkalaam.

21 poruththanaipannina Nasareyanukkum, Avan Than Kaikku Udhavugiradhaiyallaamal, Than Nasareya Viradhaththinimiththam Karththarukku Seluththum Kaanikkaikkum Aduththa Pramaanam Idhuve. Avan Seydha Poruththanaiyinpadiye Than Poruththanaiyin Pramaanaththukkerka Seydhu Theeravendum Endru Sol Endraar.
22 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
23 nee Aaronodum Avan Kumaararodum Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Isravel Puththirarai Aaseervadhikkumpodhu, Avargalaip Paarththu Sollavendiyadhaavadhu:
24 karththar Unnai Aaseervadhiththu, Unnaik Kaakkakkadavar.
25 karththar Thammudaiya Mugaththai Unmel Prakaasikkappanni, Unmel Kirubaiyaayirukkakkadavar.
26 karththar Thammudaiya Mugaththai Unmel Prasannamaakki, Unakku Samaadhaanam Kattalaiyidakkadavar Enbadhe.
27 ivvidhamaai Avargal En Naamaththai Isravel Puththirarmel Koorakkadavargal; Appozhudhu Naan Avargalai Aaseervadhippen Endru Sol Endraar.
